Summary: two small craft flying in tandem, third craft flew in different direction.
divs: sighting detailson 2\6\2012 at approxamitely 1843 hrs, i went outside to catch a breath of fresh air. as soon as i opened the front door two (2) small craft were flying slowly in tandem head in a north westerly direction at a slow rate of speed. as i watched them move away a third circlular vehicle much larger then the first two was also flying from the same position but headed in a southerly direction. as my attention was directed toward this craft it's brightly illuminated shape began to dim until it's light was completely out. this only took about 2-5 seconds. it should also be pointed out that the third craft appeared to stationary when first noticed. the first two craft's seem to have multible lights and there was a blinking strobe on them, but none could be seen on the third craft.
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were 2 other sightings in Kansas City on or around February 6th 2012
